snippet.title: The Secret Life of Dorian Pink | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.dorian.pink/

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1836850/The_Secret_Life_of_Dorian_Pink/

A choices-matter narrative RPG set in an alternate universe of the Picture of Dorian Gray by Oscar Wilde. 

Dorian Pink is a wholesome, wondrous, wrinkly old man. One day, an old friend, the Devil, kidnaps his boyfriend Basil to cook for a Feastival. 

Play as Dorian as you return to your gray past in Hell. Gain allies (or enemies). Make questionable choices (and bear the consequences). Do some menial tasks (and make doughnuts explode)...

 And when you finally feel like it, rescue your BF from Hell!!! 



Discord: https://discord.gg/AAcKmJz7Na (We have a resident narwhal...)
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/amberlimshin/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/amberlimshin
